title: Chobani CEO Importing 300 Muslim Refugees per Month
subtitle: A misleading image macro claimed Chobani's CEO vowed to "drown the United States in Muslims" and was "importing them to Idaho 300 at a time to work in his factory."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Chobani CEO Hamdi Ulukaya vowed to "drown the United States in Muslims" and is "importing them to Idaho 300 at a time to work in his factory."
